mcq.statement: Which of the following is the correct completion of the sentence? "Once a hurricane is identified, it is given a name from a list drawn up by the United States Weather Service, a list that is reused after a few years, ________"?

options.a: But with the names of the worst hurricanes emitted
options.b: Omitting the names of the worst hurricanes
options.c: The names of the worst hurricanes being omitted
options.d: After they have omitted the names of the worst hurricanes
